member.name: TYPEKIND.TKIND_MODULE
member.summary: A module that can only have static functions and data (for example, a DLL).

member.name: TYPEKIND.TKIND_INTERFACE
member.summary: A type that has virtual and pure functions.

member.name: TYPEKIND.TKIND_DISPATCH
member.summary: A set of methods and properties that are accessible through IDispatch.Invoke. By default, dual interfaces return TKIND_DISPATCH.

member.name: TYPEKIND.TKIND_COCLASS
member.summary: A set of implemented component object interfaces.

member.name: TYPEKIND.TKIND_ALIAS
member.summary: A type that is an alias for another type.

member.name: TYPEKIND.TKIND_UNION
member.summary: A union, all of whose members have an offset of zero.
